languages.text: "Для чистой души непостижимы и немыслимы пути, которыми думает грешник. Слабый духом сохранит неведение, сильный — развеет его. Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, каково это — знать каждый оттенок скверны, что селится в грешных душах..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Равнодушно пожав плечами, Инцендия холодно отвечает:{/n} "Для чистой души непостижимы и немыслимы пути, которыми думает грешник. Слабый духом сохранит неведение, сильный — развеет его. Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, каково это — знать каждый оттенок скверны, что селится в грешных душах..."

languages.text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."
languages.original_text: "Для чистой души непостижимы и немыслимы пути, которыми думает грешник. Слабый духом сохранит неведение, сильный — развеет его. Если бы ты знал{mf||а}, каково это — знать каждый оттенок скверны, что селится в грешных душах..."

traits.locale_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of a criminal mind. The weak embrace their ignorance while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it's like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

"A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of a criminal mind. The weak embrace their ignorance while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it's like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

"A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of a criminal mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it's like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

"A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of a criminal mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it's like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

"A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

"A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

languages.text: “纯洁的灵魂无法理解邪恶的思想，也无法想象这一切。弱者会陶醉在自己的无知中，而强者拒绝无知。如果你能了解堕落灵魂中的每丝腐化都是什么味道......”
languages.original_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: “纯洁的灵魂无法理解罪犯的心理，也无法想象这一切。弱者会陶醉在自己的无知中，而强者拒绝无知。如果你能熟悉，潜伏在堕落灵魂中的每丝腐化是什么滋味的话......”

languages.text: 「純粋な魂は不届き者の考えることを、想像することも理解することも出来ない。弱者は無知を認め、強者は無知を追い払う。堕落した魂に潜む全ての腐敗を知る事。それがどんな事か、お前には見当もつかないだろう…」
languages.original_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: 「純粋な魂は犯罪者の考えることを、想像することも理解することも出来ない。弱者は無知を認め、強者は無知を追い払う。堕落した魂に潜む全ての腐敗を知る事。それがどんな事か、お前には見当もつかないだろう…」

languages.text: «Un alma pura no puede concebir ni comprender el funcionamiento de una mente impía. Los débiles abrazan su ignorancia, mientras que los fuertes la destierran. Si supiera lo que es estar familiarizado con cada matiz de corrupción que acecha en las almas depravadas...».
languages.original_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: «Un alma pura no puede concebir ni comprender el funcionamiento de una mente criminal. Los débiles abrazan su ignorancia, mientras que los fuertes la destierran. Si supiera lo que es estar familiarizado con cada matiz de corrupción que acecha en las almas depravadas...».

languages.text: "Eine reine Seele kann weder begreifen noch auch nur erahnen, wie ein ehrloser Verstand funktioniert. Die Schwachen feiern ihre Ignoranz, während die Starken sie verbannen. Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, wie es ist, jede Schattierung der Verderbnis zu kennen, die in verkommenen Seelen lauert ..."
languages.original_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: "Eine reine Seele kann weder begreifen noch auch nur erahnen, wie ein verbrecherischer Verstand funktioniert. Die Schwachen feiern ihre Ignoranz, während die Starken sie verbannen. Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, wie es ist, jede Schattierung der Verderbnis zu kennen, die in verkommenen Seelen lauert ..."

languages.text: « Une âme pure ne peut concevoir ou imaginer ce qu'il se passe dans un esprit impie, mais les forts refusent de se complaire dans l'ignorance comme les faibles. Si seulement vous saviez ce que l'on ressent lorsque l'on connaît chacune des nuances de la corruption qui habite les âmes dépravées... »
languages.original_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: « Une âme pure ne peut concevoir ou imaginer ce qu'il se passe dans un esprit criminel, mais les forts refusent de se complaire dans l'ignorance comme les faibles. Si seulement vous saviez ce que l'on ressent lorsque l'on connaît chacune des nuances de la corruption qui habite les âmes dépravées... »

languages.text: "Saf bir ruh, günahkâr bir zihnin nasıl işlediğini ne algılayabilir ne de değerlendirebilir. Zayıf olanlar cehaletlerine dört elle sarılırken, güçlü olanlar onu kovar. Keşke günahkâr ruhlarda kol gezen yozlaşmanın tüm tonlarına âşina olmanın nasıl bir şey olduğunu bilebilseydin."
languages.original_text: "A pure soul cannot conceive or fathom the workings of an unrighteous mind. The weak embrace their ignorance, while the strong banish it. If only you knew what it is like to be familiar with every shade of corruption that lurks in depraved souls..."

traits.locale_text: "Saf bir ruh, günahkâr bir zihnin nasıl işlediğini ne algılayabilir ne de değerlendirebilir. Zayıf olanlar cehaletlerine dört elle sarılırken, güçlü olanlar onu kovar. Keşke günahkâr ruhlarda kol gezen yozlaşmanın tüm tonlarına âşina olmanın nasıl bir şey olduğunu bilebilseydin."
